meanings.definition: The leaves of the coriander plant, used as an herb in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added cilantro to the salsa for a burst of flavor.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for cilantro to enhance the taste of the dish.
meanings.sent3: The cilantro in the salad was feeling adventurous and decided to salsa dance.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of cilantro filled the kitchen, transporting me to a garden of herbs.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of cilantro made the dish look fresh and appetizing.

meanings.definition: The fresh leaves of the coriander plant, used as a garnish or flavoring in cooking.
meanings.sent1: She sprinkled cilantro on top of the soup as a finishing touch.
meanings.sent2: The tacos were delicious with a sprinkle of cilantro on top.
meanings.sent3: The cilantro on the plate started a tiny leaf parade around the table.
meanings.sent4: The cilantro added a pop of color to the dish, like confetti on a plate.
meanings.sent5: The scent of cilantro wafted through the air, making my mouth water in anticipation.
